languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт прерывисто вздыхает. Ее голос едва слышен.{/n} "И вот твое стремление к мести вылилось в новую эру страданий для мон-кай, элантах. Счастлив{mf||а} ли ты теперь?"
{n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you satisfied?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт прерывисто вздыхает. Ее голос едва слышен.{/n} "И вот твое стремление к мести вылилось в новую эру страданий для мон-кай, элантах. Счастлив{mf||а} ли ты теперь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you happy now?"
{n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you happy now?"
{n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you happy now?"
{n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you satisfied?"

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特嘶哑地叹了口气，声音几乎像耳语一般。{/n}“也就是说，你对复仇的渴望为猴子带来了新的痛苦，外界人。你现在满意了吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you satisfied?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特嘶哑地叹了口气，声音几乎像耳语一般。{/n}“也就是说，你对复仇的渴望为猴子带来了新的痛苦，外界人。你现在满意了吗？”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet suspira profundamente. Su voz es apenas un susurro:{/n} «Tu búsqueda de la venganza ha traído una nueva era de sufrimiento para los mon-keigh, elantach. ¿Te satisface eso?».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you satisfied?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet suspira profundamente. Su voz es apenas un susurro:{/n} «Tu búsqueda de la venganza ha traído una nueva era de sufrimiento para los mon-keigh, elantach. ¿Te conformarás con eso?».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは荒くため息をつく。彼女の声は、ほとんどささやき声のようだ。{/n}「復讐の探求心が、モン＝ケイへの新たな苦しみの時代をもたらしたのだ、エランタ。これで満足か？」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you satisfied?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは荒くため息をつく。彼女の声は、ほとんどささやき声のようだ。{/n}「復讐の探求心が、モン＝ケイへの新たな苦しみの時代をもたらしたのだ、エランタ。これで満足か？」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet pousse un soupir de lassitude et dit à voix basse :{/n} « Ainsi, dans votre quête de vengeance, vous enfermez les mon-keigh dans une nouvelle ère de souffrance, elantach. Êtes-vous {mf|satisfait|satisfaite} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you satisfied?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet pousse un soupir de lassitude et dit à voix basse :{/n} « Ainsi, dans votre quête de vengeance, vous enfermez les mon-keigh dans une nouvelle ère de souffrance, elantach. Êtes-vous {mf|satisfait|satisfaite} ? »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet seufzt zittrig. Ihre Stimme ist kaum mehr als ein Flüstern:{/n} "Und so hat Euer Streben nach Rache eine neue Ära des Leids für die Chem-Pan-Sey eingeläutet, Elantach. Seid Ihr zufrieden?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you satisfied?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet seufzt zittrig. Ihre Stimme ist kaum mehr als ein Flüstern:{/n} "Und so hat Euer Streben nach Rache eine neue Ära des Leids für die Chem-Pan-Sey eingeläutet, Elantach. Seid Ihr jetzt zufrieden?"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, nefesi titreyerek iç çekiyor. Fısıltıdan hâllice bir sesle sözlerine başlıyor.{/n} "İntikam arayışınız, mon-keighler için yeni bir eziyet çağını başlattı işte elantach. Mutlu musunuz?"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet sighs raggedly. Her voice is scarcely above a whisper:{/n} "And so your quest for revenge has brought forth a new era of suffering for mon-keigh, elantach. Are you satisfied?"
